name: PixelWire
description:
PixelWire is a cellular automaton based off Wire World. It is written in C++ using the Pixel Game Engine for OLC CodeJam 2020.

Information is included in the software itself.

A number of demo worlds are prepared for those who are new to Wire World. Have fun, and feel free to share anything you make :)

For source code, as well as information on how to compile for Linux and Mac OS, please see the GitHub page.
